page.title: 09Health facilities
page.content: There are no{health}clinics,dentists or{doctors}in Mowsley or Laughton.Most people from Laughton and some from Mowsley go to the Kibworth surgery,the rest to Husbands Bosworth.Both surgeries have a nurse and hold regular ante-natal and baby clinics. Most people go to Market Harborough or Leicester for{dentists,}but some go to Rugby, Uppingham and Derby. People moving into the area tend to keep their previous dentist . The primary school has visits from local health nurses to check teeth, nails and hair(for head lice).The children have{medical examinations} when they begin and finish school.The school has no dental inspections. There are no major health problems, although mild bronchial and catarrhal infections are more frequent than in some areas.
